items.question: How does BNPL work?
items.answer: Split your purchase into 4 equal payments. Pay 25% upfront and the rest over 3 bi-weekly payments.

items.question: Are there any hidden fees?
items.answer: All terms are transparent and upfront. No hidden fees, no surprises. What you see is what you pay.

items.question: Is approval instant?
items.answer: Quick and seamless approval process. Most applications are approved within seconds.
